nodes.bodyText: Not sure if before is too much since at the moment we have no use for it. I'm open for suggestions on removing/keeping.
We can validate only if validation is running?

@jomarko I agree with you.. but it highlights the isValidationRunning() does not do what you'd expect it to (given it's name). In fact the method returns the opposite of the boolean flag isValidationRunning. @Rikkola I think the method could be better named.. and, since the MenuSessionItems class now contains quite a lot of logic relating to running validation, it might be an idea to move everything you've added to a new validation support type class. WDYT?
